meta.name: description
meta.content: Community High School District 218 is a public high school district with offices in Oak Lawn, IL. CHSD 218 includes Eisenhower High School, Richards High School, Shepard High School, Delta Learning Center, Summit Learning Center, and the Adult Transition Program.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: CHSD 218 Eisenhower Richards Shepard Delta Summit ATP

div.p: District 218 schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year. Open this news item for an update from Dr. Ty Harting, Superintendent of Schools.

div.div: District 218 schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year. Open this news item for an update from Dr. Ty Harting, Superintendent of Schools.

Due to COVID-19, District 218 must close its campuses to the community. This means no one may use the athletic fields, tracks, tennis courts, or any other part of campus. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
Experiencing an issue while working on your remote learning assignments? Open this news item for support options.
In response to COVID-19, Comcast will offer eligible people from low-income households 60 days of free internet service. Open this news item for more information.
Open this news items for details.
